attributes.action: Visit a GP surgery to find out how they actually work
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The PM should actually visit GP surgeries and speak with those at the coal face instead of listening to those who have not got a clueabout the work undertaken bt Primary Care. The GPs did not ask to opt out of out of hours care - Blair almost enforced it. GPs did not ask for a pay rise they were forced in to it.
